concept.title: Getting Started
concept.shortdesc: As a cloud user, you can access the Eucalyptus cloud using a command line interface such as Euca2ools, or using a web-based interface such as the Eucalyptus User Console. You can switch between them freely. What you create in one will be accessible through the other.

conbody.p: To access Eualyptus you need keys for Euca2ools and a password for the Console. To request access, talk to your cloud administrator. If you are using Euca2ools and want to get started, see . If you are using the Eucalyptus User Console and want to get started, see .
